Purpose - Short: Check whether cells are alive or dead
Purpose - Long: Mixed into bioink, turns dead cells blue - can be replaced with ml?

Purpose - Short: Alt to Trypan Blue, checks if cells are alive
Purpose - Long: Train a ml model on cells on laptop, compress, run on pi live as the print runs
Suspend cellsin this material to print in jelly, converts to solid after reaction with calium chloride
